text: nænxn ying phwk cea ca thuk thdsxb nı thraphysmbati khxng phwk cea læa taw khxng phwk cea læa nænxn ying phwk cea ca diyin cak brrda phu thi di rab khamphir kxn hna phwk cea læa brrda phu thi hı mi phakhi khun (kæ xallxh) sung kar kx khwam deuxdrxn xan makmay læa hak phwk cea xdthn læa yakerng læw thæcring nan khux swn hnung cak kickar thi deddeiyw
